alert.note: Alert for West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 03 at 4:20AM MST until December 03 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 5 and 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Rabbit Ears Pass. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Visibilities may drop below 1/4 mile due to falling and blowing snow. Snow covered roads will make travel hazardous. Travel may become very difficult to impossible due to heavy snowfall on roadways.
info.instruction: If you are planning travel over Rabbit Ears Pass today, consider altering your plans. Heavy snowfall is expected to make travel very difficult to impossible through this evening. If you do travel, allow extra time to reach your destination and carry a winter travel kit including a shovel, warm clothes, and extra food and water in case you are stranded.

area.areaDesc: West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet
